entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Runtime Async Experiment #94620
    9.0.0
  • IlcStandaloneGCSupport Not Working For NativeAoT #94618
  • System numerics abort at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #94610
  • dotnet core cannot load FIPS built shared library in linux #94598
    Future
  • [wasm] Build doesn't rebuild when certain properties change #94595
    9.0.0
  • Xamarin MAUI iOS using .NET 7 & 8 and OData client throwing Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper dynamic-method) #94594
  • {U}Int128 divided by 0 throws wrong exception type #94593

Closed

  • Pinning ROS with known length causes unnecessary code generation. #94559
    9.0.0
  • AV in LibraryImport tests #93155
  • ILLink : InvalidCastException in AssemblyReferencesCorrector #93796
  • JIT: Redundant code when Span index is known to be out-of-bounds #13773
    Future
  • JIT: dead stores are not eliminated #13727
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] library tests broken on `main` #94596
    9.0.0
  • Exclude properties of delegate types in configuration source generator #94117
    9.0.0
  • Chrome / Chromium 119 Breaks .NET 6.0.0 Webassembly - Update SDK & Runtime to 6.0.24 to Mitigate #94570
    6.0.x
  • Incorrect GNU linker detection when cross-compiling on non-GNU-linker host OS #94355
  • [wasm] Implement ValueTask marshaling #61368
    Future
  • Determinism for NativeAOT #73931
    Future
  • Emit Contention/Start and Contention/Stop Events on Native AOT Apps #76754
    9.0.0
  • Valgrind reports Native AOT shared library memory leaks #81008
    Future
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #91769
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono-debug] refactor access to MonoDebugInformationEnc #94617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • try different arm32 images #94616
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasi][wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Calculate PackageVersionNet7 #94614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion #94613
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94612
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 8.0.x
  • [NO-MERGE][8.0] Update alpine arm32 in release 8.0 CI #94609
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Implement StoreVectorAndZipNxM for Arm64 #94607
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Sve: Early versions of Intrinsics/Arm/Sve and hwintrinsiclistarm64sve #94606
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94602
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • [browser][MT] GC coop safepoints #94601
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] pool don't yield to event loop #94600
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Search less assertion prop #94597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Switch StandaloneApp6x to pre-built test asset #94590
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • JIT: Sparse conditional propagation in value numbering #94563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use correct native type in test marshallers #93432
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: fix cross block assertion prop #94608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] no threads #94599
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94588
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94506
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.2
  • [browser] Remove ValueTask interop test placeholders #94560
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94402
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Disallow inlining Main #94449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94401
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Initial patch to fix RISCV64 interpreter #94548
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: stop computing dom start nodes for morph RPO #94497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #94485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94540
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94478
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Print finally clone stats with JitTimeLogCsv #94533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing (16) #94525
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow preinitializing RuntimeType instances #94405
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing (13) #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] sidecar testing #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement frozen object heap #94515
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [docs] Add Mono Library Mode and update Mono Profiled AOT #94578
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Reproducible and verifiable NativeAOT builds #1632

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Update Emcc to 3.1.47 and LLVM to 17.0.4 #2379
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows service crashes on system shutdown #36802
  • Self-contained Microsoft.WindowsDesktop-targeting app is published with whole WPF and WinForms frameworks which are not used #36790
  • The .NET 8 SDK installer recommends Visual Studio 17.7 when it should recommend 17.8 #36785

Closed

  • [Package Validation] We should support excluding tfms when running the validation #22901
    Backlog
  • Can't install MAUI workload for iOS and MacOs on Windows #36653

PullRequests

Created

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36748
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add option to ignore baseline TFMs #36669
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2313141 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add packagesprops template #36387
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • generic constraint: where T : ref struct #1148
    Working Set

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    12.0
  • [Proposal] Forcing ConfigureAwait(false) on assembly level #2542

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix type name, nameof argument in primary constructors speclet #7673

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • inheritdoc can't resolve type aliased constructors #70770
  • IntelliSense does not suggest anything when inside a collection expression #70760
  • Possibly fragile code in Binder_Query.cs around manipulations with arguments of a method call #70758
    17.10

Closed

  • Excessive permissions on /tmp/VBCSCompiler #61900
    17.6
  • System.BadImageFormatException: Could not load file or assemby 'csc.exe' or one of its dependencies. #70735
  • VerifyOverloadsUpdated integration tests are failing #70511
  • Quick Info tests fail when using new editor package versions #65840

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle satellite assembly loading in .NET Core #70769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Performance]: Cache last PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers result when the result is a namespace #70767
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.EnsureTypeParametersAreLoaded` #70766
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Keep the solution pinned (on host and OOP) when making multiple calls between systems. #70765
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable IntelliSense for collection expressions #70763
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Create params arrays during binding #70762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break some binding cycles #70759
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix VB intellisense integration test #70756
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disabling roll forward #70768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix contract assertion firing with SG OOP syncing. (main) #70764
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove conflicting key binding for integration tests #70523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix contract assertion firing with SG OOP syncing. #70755
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid some first-chance exceptions by returning instead #70695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove the old integration test projects #70716
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Link to topic about choosing diagnostic IDs #70700
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebAssemblyPreloader component #51989
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #51988
  • Blazor EventCallback possibility to access delegate #51987
  • Program.cs is not called in Blazor Web App Client project (RC2) #51986
  • Blazor wasm PWA install button (for IOS / Android web app on home screen) #51985
  • MapRazorComponents unexpectedly requires antiforgery middleware #51981
  • InputFile in Blazor SSR #51980
  • [Linux] After creating the Blazor Web App on Visual Studio Code, running it and clicking "Counters/Weather/Home" in the browser list on the left, cannot navigate to the target page. #51979
  • blazor ssr form processing issues #51978
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #51977
  • AddOpenIdConnect is not called in ASP.NET 7 + Angular SPA project. #51972

Closed

  • No documentation or support for projects that use @angular/localize #51859
    Discussions
  • CascadingParameter set in MainLayout.razor doesn't work as expected in .NET 8 #51955
  • Strange message loss when a client sends a message to hub #51853
  • blazor web app does not render properly #48714
    Planning: WebUI
  • Object disposed exception when deserializing an async enumerable in Blazor WASM #51983
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object. Object name: 'DotNetObjectReference`1'. #51973
  • Perf regression: caching, mvc, updates #51953

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51974
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Rename label `help-wanted` to `help wanted` #51982
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement doc comment #51490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51637
    Servicing-consider, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OnNavigatedTo being called twice when Navigating to Modal page #18688
  • Add NuGet publishing step/gate for Manifest packages #18687
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Cannot retrieve larger string from SecureStorage #18685
  • [iOS] canvas.GetStringSize() is not consistent with actual string size in GraphicsView #18679
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D12 #18675
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D11 #18673
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Incorrect Rendering of Gradient Color on iOS and macOS when Clipping Custom View #18671
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Permissions.RequestAsync<Permissions.Sensors> does not return a value on iOS16+ #18669
    Backlog
  • RadioButton disabled UI issue - iOS #18668
    Backlog
  • Creating .NET MAUI App project in onedrive results in error #18666
    Backlog

Closed

  • Publish Unpackaged Apps Error(Project Reference MAUI Library ) #9064
  • Can't run unit tests with MAUI and net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0 #18268
  • Skia graphics default font change bug. #18497
  • MAUI - Android App crashes when using a custom scheme URL to resume with a Frame and Entry #18362
  • [Enhancement] Wifi Adapter Controls #18612
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Issue when using BindableLayout and Entry/Editor #15937
    Under Consideration
  • [iOS] canvas.GetStringSize() not considering newlines #18572

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix Flyout toolbar #18684
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Switch` #18682
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Slider` #18681
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [C] implicit style VSM do not override Manual value #18680
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D12 #18677
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D11 #18676
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fixed Editor placeholder position based on alignment #18672
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-editor
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `ImageButton` #18602
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Stepper` #18663
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-stepper, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 8.0.0-preview.23472.1 to 8.0.0-preview1.23165.1 #18593
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix PlatformStringSizeService on iOS/Catalyst to use correct API #18621
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.2 to 17.8.0 #18641
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
    area/controls 🎮
  • Arrange content based on arrangement bounds rather than viewport bounds #18586
    area/layout 🔲
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.3 to 3.14.0 #18601
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A Question about DbContextPooling and RowLevelSecurity #32275
  • Unable to work with nvarcharr(max) code first - generated parameters for insert are length 4000 #32274
  • ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly is ordering config by class FullName instead by dependencies #32273
  • Add APIs for registering keyed EF services in DI #32272

Closed

  • Refactor ShadowEntityTypeTest #29036
    MQ

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #32235 - Buffering error in JSON deserialization with junk data #32253
  • [release/8.0] Contains nullability processing #32265
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Visit arguments in QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor after converting List.Contains (#32219) #32266
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Update prebuilts package version to 9.0.100-4 #17763
  • Downgrade implicit version #17762
  • Fix the minimum version logic to take into account that we're off-by-one for the 100 release #17761
  • Consume portable RID graph from runtime #17760

Merged

  • Fix the author of VMR commits #17759
  • Use correct yaml block style in vmr-synchronization.yml #17758
  • Set git author information in vmr-synchronization.yml #17757
  • Remove empty class #14072
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17742
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #17739

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #17753
